title: Nirvana
lyrics:
Lyric Gohi - Nirvana

[Romanization]

You were gone by the time I got up for you
And I was gone by the time you got up for me
Was I out for too long?
Wishing on a star
Saying that I’ll be back for you

What’s the point if I can’t have you in my arms
I ran away from my heart to be next to you
But you’re now on your way

I’d give my all to keep you smiling
You took me in on those hollow nights
So even if it takes a lifetime
It won’t even matter
I’ll be holding your hand
Even on the other side


Should’ve left in July when I had a chance
Didn’t know that it would be our last phone call
I’m still dreaming of you
Going through our voicemail
Reminiscing on your words

What’s the point if I can’t have you in my arms
I ran away from my heart to be next to you
But you’re now on your way

I’d give my all to keep you smiling
You took me in on those hollow nights
So even if it takes a lifetime
It won’t even matter
I’ll be holding your hand
Even on the other side

Even on the other side
(Even on the other side)
Even on the other side
(Even on the other side)
Even on the other side
(Even on the other side)
Even on the other side
(Even on the other side)

I’d give my all to keep you smiling
You took me in on those hollow nights
And even if it takes a lifetime
It won’t even matter
I’ll be holding your hand
Even on the other side

[Hangeul]

You were gone by the time I got up for you

Wishing on a star

I ran away from my heart to be next to you

But you’re now on your way



I’d give my all to keep you smiling

You took me in on those hollow nights

So even if it takes a lifetime

It won’t even matter

I’ll be holding your hand

Even on the other side

I’m still dreaming of you

Going through our voicemail

Reminiscing on your words



What’s the point if I can’t have you in my arms

I ran away from my heart to be next to you

But you’re now on your way



I’d give my all to keep you smiling

You took me in on those hollow nights

So even if it takes a lifetime

I’ll be holding your hand

Even on the other side



Even on the other side

(Even on the other side)

I’d give my all to keep you smiling
